00017 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::getAnalogueModelFromName(std::string name, ParameterMap& params) {
00018 
00019   if (name == "SimplePathlossModel")
00020   {
00021     return initializeSimplePathlossModel(params);
00022   }
00023   else if (name == "LogNormalShadowing")
00024   {
00025     return initializeLogNormalShadowing(params);
00026   }
00027   else if (name == "JakesFading")
00028   {
00029     return initializeJakesFading(params);
00030   }
00031   return BasePhyLayer::getAnalogueModelFromName(name, params);
00032 }
00033 
00034 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::initializeLogNormalShadowing(ParameterMap& params){
00035   double mean = params["mean"].doubleValue();
00036   double stdDev = params["stdDev"].doubleValue();
00037   simtime_t interval = params["interval"].doubleValue();
00038 
00039   return new LogNormalShadowing(mean, stdDev, interval);
00040 }

00042 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::initializeJakesFading(ParameterMap& params){
00043   int fadingPaths = params["fadingPaths"].longValue();
00044   simtime_t delayRMS = params["delayRMS"].doubleValue();
00045   simtime_t interval = params["interval"].doubleValue();
00046 
00047   double carrierFrequency = 2.412e+9;
00048   if(params.count("carrierFrequency") > 0) {
00049     carrierFrequency = params["carrierFrequency"];
00050   }
00051   else {
00052     if (cc->hasPar("carrierFrequency")) {
00053       carrierFrequency = cc->par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue();
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   return new JakesFading(fadingPaths, delayRMS, &move, carrierFrequency, interval);
00058 }

00060 AnalogueModel* PhyLayer::initializeSimplePathlossModel(ParameterMap& params){
00061 
00062   // init with default value
00063   double alpha = 3.5;
00064   double carrierFrequency = 2.412e+9;
00065   bool useTorus = world->useTorus();
00066   const Coord& playgroundSize = *(world->getPgs());
00067 
00068   // get alpha-coefficient from config
00069   ParameterMap::iterator it = params.find("alpha");
00070 
00071   if ( it != params.end() ) // parameter alpha has been specified in config.xml
00072   {
00073     // set alpha
00074     alpha = it->second.doubleValue();
00075     coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): alpha set from config.xml to " << alpha << endl;
00076 
00077     // check whether alpha is not smaller than specified in ConnectionManager
00078     if(cc->hasPar("alpha") && alpha < cc->par("alpha").doubleValue())
00079     {
00080           // throw error
00081       opp_error("TestPhyLayer::createPathLossModel(): alpha can't be smaller than specified in \
00082                  ConnectionManager. Please adjust your config.xml file accordingly");
00083     }
00084   }
00085   else // alpha has not been specified in config.xml
00086   {
00087     if (cc->hasPar("alpha")) // parameter alpha has been specified in ConnectionManager
00088     {
00089       // set alpha according to ConnectionManager
00090       alpha = cc->par("alpha").doubleValue();
00091       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): alpha set from ConnectionManager to " << alpha << endl;
00092     }
00093     else // alpha has not been specified in ConnectionManager
00094     {
00095       // keep alpha at default value
00096       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): alpha set from default value to " << alpha << endl;
00097     }
00098   }
00099 
00100   // get carrierFrequency from config
00101   it = params.find("carrierFrequency");
00102 
00103   if ( it != params.end() ) // parameter carrierFrequency has been specified in config.xml
00104   {
00105     // set carrierFrequency
00106     carrierFrequency = it->second.doubleValue();
00107     coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from config.xml to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00108 
00109     // check whether carrierFrequency is not smaller than specified in ConnectionManager
00110     if(cc->hasPar("carrierFrequency") && carrierFrequency < cc->par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue())
00111     {
00112       // throw error
00113       opp_error("TestPhyLayer::createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency can't be smaller than specified in \
00114                  ConnectionManager. Please adjust your config.xml file accordingly");
00115     }
00116   }
00117   else // carrierFrequency has not been specified in config.xml
00118   {
00119     if (cc->hasPar("carrierFrequency")) // parameter carrierFrequency has been specified in ConnectionManager
00120     {
00121       // set carrierFrequency according to ConnectionManager
00122       carrierFrequency = cc->par("carrierFrequency").doubleValue();
00123       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from ConnectionManager to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00124     }
00125     else // carrierFrequency has not been specified in ConnectionManager
00126     {
00127       // keep carrierFrequency at default value
00128       coreEV << "createPathLossModel(): carrierFrequency set from default value to " << carrierFrequency << endl;
00129     }
00130   }
00131 
00132   return new SimplePathlossModel(alpha, carrierFrequency, &move, useTorus, playgroundSize, coreDebug);
00133 
00134 }

00136 Decider* PhyLayer::getDeciderFromName(std::string name, ParameterMap& params) {
00137   if(name == "Decider80211") {
00138     return initializeDecider80211(params);
00139   }
00140   else if(name == "SNRThresholdDecider"){
00141     return initializeSNRThresholdDecider(params);
00142   }
00143 
00144   return BasePhyLayer::getDeciderFromName(name, params);
00145 }
00146 
00147 Decider* PhyLayer::initializeDecider80211(ParameterMap& params) {
00148   double threshold = params["threshold"];
00149   double centerFreq = params["centerFrequency"];
00150   return new Decider80211(this, threshold, sensitivity, centerFreq, findHost()->getIndex(), coreDebug);
00151 }
00152 
00153 Decider* PhyLayer::initializeSNRThresholdDecider(ParameterMap& params) {
00154   double threshold = params["threshold"];
00155   return new SNRThresholdDecider(this, threshold, sensitivity, findHost()->getIndex(), coreDebug);
00156 }
